name: Royal Plush
description:
Royal Plush follows the story of a plush teddy bear in a ordinary, yet mysterious household. 

  • Gain powerful abilities as you do quests for your friend, King Snake.
  • Swallow items and bounce all over the place.
  • Climb effortlessly with octopus tentacles.
  • Glide and dive to traverse the house at ultra high speeds with bat wings.
  • Sneak around to avoid the mom, baby and roomba as they mutate into horrific forms.
  • Escape before it's too late!

Pick up this horror-filled adventure for free today for Windows or Mac.

Developed by Team Whirligig: Allyson Walpole, Brandon Pearson, Callie Koch, Henry Gammad, Mitchio Porter, Rishi Amarnani, and Ryan Martin.
